trends: There have been 2 other sightings in La Vergne
There were no other sightings in La Vergne on or around December 25th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was up wrapping presents and watching the television when i was finished i looked out of the window in my bedroom. this window has a great view of the stars looking towards the north. i scanned the sky as i do quite often at night because i am a big fan of the stars so it was very clear last night and good for star watching. i noticed 3 brightly glowing lights in the shape of a line. it was horizontal and the three lights were evenly spaced. the lights "looked" like they belonged to one object not 3. it would have been super huge, bigger then any airplane i have ever seen. these lights just stayed there for awhile. i began looking out at around 4 am, the object(s) remained there in the sky brightly shining until around 4:20 am. i was staring at them for awhile saying to myself and my sleeping husband i have never seen the stars in that shape before. but i had on the past sunday coming from the town of lewisburg in tn. after a cousins church play. it reminded me of that, because i noticed on the drive home at night with a very clear sky three star looking lights vertical in the sky. i was trying to make sure they were not apart of the dippers and they were not. i didnt notice that they were moving i told my husband that night that i had never noticed the stars in that shape before but he isnt into that and he was driving on a country road. okay so back to last night. i had decided to see if these lights were in motion so i lined them up with the treetops a little ways from my home. i went back to the window after laying down for a few minutes and they were no longer at the point i at measured them they had moved on a bit, then i watched a little longer and sat back down then got up again and they had gotten farther away. the once bright lights were now barely visible with the naked eye. you could still tell that the shape was huge and that they were lights. i have no idea what this was but it was strange to me. i live near a little airport and a larger airport in the next city and i see planes and saw planes last night. i didnt see anything go near the object which i began to look for. there were also not alot of planes flying i assume due to it being christmas eve\christmas. i would love to know if anyone else saw this. also the objects seemed to tile or dip on the right side a little more then it was already but it never went vertical while i could see it.
